title: Human Robots - three essays about the future of technology and s
description:
Human robots: a compilation of essays about the future.
=======================================================

Three essays on how massive change to our society might be closer than we think, and governed by powerful forces which don't have democracy or the best interests of the 99% as concerns.

What will a society served by robots, and ruled by those who control the robots look like?

The three essays are:

On the Phenomenon of Bullshit Jobs
 - David Graeber

Drones will cause an upheaval of society like we haven't seen in 700 years
 - Noah Smith

Rise of the Bond villains
 - Izabella Kaminska
